prompts.title: Develop a Digital Marketing Strategy for {{business_name}}
prompts.content: Create a comprehensive digital marketing strategy for {{business_name}} focusing on channels like SEO, PPC, social media, and email marketing to achieve {{business_goal}}.
prompts.description: Generates a digital marketing plan tailored to a specific business goal.

prompts.title: Implement Retargeting Ads for Abandoned Carts
prompts.content: Design a retargeting ad campaign to recover abandoned carts on {{ecommerce_website}}. Include ad creatives, messaging, and targeting options.
prompts.description: Aims to increase conversions by retargeting interested customers.

prompts.title: Develop a Content Marketing Strategy for {{brand}}
prompts.content: Create a content marketing strategy for {{brand}} that includes target audience identification, content types, distribution channels, and KPIs.
prompts.description: Outlines a plan to attract and engage customers through content.

prompts.title: Produce a Podcast Series on {{theme}}
prompts.content: Develop a podcast series focused on {{theme}}, including episode topics, guest speakers, and distribution platforms.
prompts.description: Creates audio content to reach audiences in a convenient format.

variables.name: theme
variables.description: Main theme or topic of the podcast

prompts.title: Create a Social Media Strategy for {{brand}}
prompts.content: Develop a social media marketing strategy for {{brand}} across platforms like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and LinkedIn to achieve {{goal}}.
prompts.description: Plans social media activities to meet specific objectives.

prompts.title: Identify Influencers for Collaboration
prompts.content: Research and list potential influencers in the {{industry}} industry who align with {{brand}}'s values for collaboration opportunities.
prompts.description: Finds suitable influencers to expand reach.

prompts.title: Create an Email Newsletter for {{brand}}
prompts.content: Compose a monthly email newsletter for {{brand}} that includes updates, promotions, and valuable content tailored to {{audience}}.
prompts.description: Generates an engaging newsletter to keep subscribers informed and interested.

prompts.title: A/B Test Email Subject Lines
prompts.content: Create two variations of email subject lines for {{email_campaign}} to conduct an A/B test and determine which one has a higher open rate.

variables.name: email_campaign
variables.description: Name or purpose of the email campaign

prompts.title: Create a Google Ads Campaign for {{product_or_service}}
prompts.content: Develop a Google Ads campaign to promote {{product_or_service}}, including keyword selection, ad groups, ad copy, and bidding strategies.
prompts.description: Sets up a paid search campaign to increase visibility.

prompts.title: Analyze SEM Campaign Performance
prompts.content: Review the performance of {{campaign}} by analyzing metrics like click-through rates, cost-per-click, and conversion rates. Provide insights and optimization suggestions.
prompts.description: Evaluates SEM campaigns to improve results.
